settings.text:
We have created the My Champions Club specifically for you, as a way of saying ‘thank you‘ for your loyalty and continued support for our Australian owned and made horse feeds and supplements.

We are very excited to be able to offer you a fantastic program that allows you to redeem the tokens on the side of your HYGAIN feed bags for Hygain supplements and merchandise.

Collect your first 10 tokens to join the program and fill out the below form to become part of the exclusive My Champions Club!!

We look forward to welcoming you soon!!

settings.title: JOIN MY CHAMPIONS CLUB
settings.sub_title: To become a member download the application form below and mail it to the address provided with your 10 tokens.*
settings.text:
VIEW REDEMPTION OPTIONS AND DOWNLOAD MEMBERS REDEMPTION FORM HERE

*Hygain Allrounder, Hygain Fibressentials and the Hygain Supplement Range do not have a Champions Club token on their packaging and are not part of this program.

settings.title: HOW MY CHAMPION CLUB WORKS
settings.sub_title: Follow the steps below and start collecting the HYGAIN merchandise and supplements today.
settings.text_1:
Cut 10 HYGAIN Champions Club tokens off the side of your HYGAIN feed bag. (Please note: not the barcode!)

Become a member of our HYGAIN Rewards Program by filling out the REWARDS APPLICATION FORM and send the form along with 10 Champions Club tokens to Hy Gain Feeds Pty Ltd, Rewards Program, PO Box 199, Officer, 3809 VIC, Australia

Once you are part of the club, we will issue you an exclusive HYGAIN Champions Club account and you can log-in to the exclusive members area where you will have access to all the information on our fantastic merchandise and the number of tokens required for each item.
